meanings.def: a copy of a book, piece of music, etc. before it has been printed
examples: in manuscript I read her poems in manuscript.
He submitted the manuscript to an editor at Longman.
He was delighted when the manuscript was accepted for publication.
I only have one copy of the manuscript.
The text ran to dozens of pages in manuscript form.
the original autograph manuscript of the poem

meanings.def: a very old book or document that was written by hand before printing was invented
examples: One contemporary manuscript shows Henry II crowned by the hand of Christ.
